content.rendered:
Sep 08

NEET Answer Released

12:00 am - 12:00 am
Sep 08

NEET Repeaters Batch Started

12:00 am - 12:00 am
Apr 26

CBSE Class X & XII Term-II thoery exams will commence

12:00 am - 12:00 am
Apr 26

Examinations Will be conducted in offline Mode

3:30 pm - 4:30 pm
Feb 20

Data Sheet will be released on board’s website at cbse.nic.in

10:30 am - 11:30 am
